txt.en: Talk to Elfhelm at the river crossing in Talath Anor.
Instance: The Reclamation of Talath Anor
Defeat enemies at the farm alongside Elfhelm and his men.

'[placeholder], I thank you for lending your hand in combat and for your invaluable knowledge of Talath Anor and the Haradrim. It has made this ride a success, as we no longer need worry about a Haradrim ambush near Minas Tirith. I am concerned about Cair Andros however. We should tell Éomer and Aragorn of what we have seen.'
'Join us, [placeholder]! Éomer King has commanded us to drive the Haradrim from Talath Anor!'
The last few Haradrim have escaped to Cair Andros
'There is nothing more we can do. Most of the Haradrim forces gathered in Talath Anor are now defeated. Let us return to Aragorn's Pavilion.'
It looks as if the Haradrim are making a stand
Some of the enemies flee on horse
'I thank you for lending your hand in combat.'
With renewed spirit, Éomer, king of Rohan, has decided to send Elfhelm to lead an attack against a band of Haradrim who has fled into Talath Anor.
